welcome.label.minimum_requirement: We support Safari version 11 and above.\nChrome version 53 and above for KYC.
auth.label.not_us_citizen: I am not a U.S. citizen and considered a ‘non-resident for tax purposes’.
auth.label.agree_with_term_and_privacy: I agree with this terms & conditions  and Privacy Policy / AML & CTPF Policy agreements.
auth.label.receive_marketing_news: I would like to receive marketing news, promotions, and any other information from Crypto and its affiliates.
